entries.abort: We are almost there and you're aborting? If I make it out alive, your commanding officer will hear of this!
entries.arrived_at_loc: You have arrived at the right location. The freighter should be there any moment.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.complete: Good job pilot. Return to the base on Yavin 4 for some well deserved rest.
entries.failed_destroy: We have lost contact with our freighter! Return to the base on Yavin 4, we expect a full report on this incident!
entries.failed_protect: Our freighter had to perform a emergency hyperjump. After all you have gone through, I won't blame you for this failure pilot. Hopefully he's safe.
entries.found_loc: Rebel Command: < Proceed to these coordinates to meet with the freighter. >
entries.goodbye_1: Thank you pilot, that was a close one. I'm in your debt.
entries.goodbye_2: Thank you pilot, that was a close one. I'm in your debt.
entries.goodbye_3: Thank you pilot, that was a close one. I'm in your debt.
entries.goodbye_4: Thank you pilot, that was a close one. I'm in your debt.
entries.goodbye_5: Thank you pilot, that was a close one. I'm in your debt.
entries.hull_half: My hull is taking heavy damage. I hope you can get these TIE's off me pilot!
entries.panic_3: Imperial TIE ships heading our way! This will get ugly...
entries.panic_5: Prepare for battle, we have boogeys incoming!
entries.quest_escort_d: Bring the freighter to the rest of the fleet. Be very careful and don't let any Imperial ships survive with knowledge of where you are taking this freighter.
entries.quest_location_d: This area of the Endor system will be very dangerous right now as its the sector the Empire believe still may have some parts of our fleet in it.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The freighter is set to arrive at these coordinates any moment now.
entries.reason_1: Hey, where is everyone?! Oh they relocated and you will take me to them? Alright, lets get moving.
entries.reason_2: Hey, where is everyone?! Oh they relocated and you will take me to them? Alright, lets get moving.
entries.reason_3: Hey, where is everyone?! Oh they relocated and you will take me to them? Alright, lets get moving.
entries.reason_4: Hey, where is everyone?! Oh they relocated and you will take me to them? Alright, lets get moving.
entries.reason_5: Hey, where is everyone?! Oh they relocated and you will take me to them? Alright, lets get moving.
entries.shields_depleted: My shields are out, curse the Empire!
entries.taunt_1: Well well, what do we have here.
entries.taunt_3: I heard what you did to our bombers. Prepare to pay!
entries.taunt_4: The Empire has tolerated you long enough Rebel!
entries.taunt_5: Your useless campaign ends here scum!
entries.thanks_1: I thought that was it for me, thank you buddy!
entries.thanks_2: I'm still holding together, hopefully that was the last of them.
entries.thanks_5: Phew, I don't think I can take anymore of that.
entries.title: Endor system: Escort straggling freighter to main fleet.
entries.title_d: One of the fleets freighters are just arriving at the original coordinates. You need to meet up with him and escort him to the rest of the fleet.
